author: Al Jazeera
title: Virus forced schools online, but many students did not follow
description: Teachers across the country report their attempts at distance learning are failing to reach large numbers of students.
content:
During the first week that her San Diego public school was shuttered to slow the spread of the coronavirus, not one of Elise Samaniego's students logged on to her virtual classroom.
Three weeks in, the teacher still had not connected online with roughly two-… [+5884 chars]
